ygData.subject: Looking for a few good bards !
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow bards ! Due to a sore lack of rp events on the supposed RP server Fennin Ro, I have decided to organize the first Norrathian Rock Band (don t
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow bards !

Due to a sore lack of rp events on the supposed "RP" server Fennin Ro, I
have decided to organize the first Norrathian Rock Band (don't laugh -yet ).
What i am planning to do is get a few bards together, no more than 5 or so,
and do a Tour across Norrath , playing a concert one city every week, on
whenever time everyone can (most likely friday or saturday night) . what i
would like to do for the band (tentative name: The Lutesmashers) would be to
take popular songs (new and old) and "midevalize" them. I think it would
hopefully start a chain reaction of events on the server, and would also be
a good time with lots of laughs for all in attendance.
here's the list of people i am looking for :
a drummer (any lvl 5 and up bard)
a bassist (any lvl 8 and up bard)
a lead singer (any bard of any level who can type fast and accurately and
please a crowd :)
a Introducer ("And now, live from the Freeport Amphitheater, the
Lutesmashers!")
anyone with humorous/interesting song ideas
a couple people to RP security guards or roadies.


well, thats all.. i really hope this will be successful, i am tired of
reading on EQVault about the other server's events and there are NONE on
Fennin , this should give the other guys something to be jealous about :)

-Kyar
